subject: p10046166
History: Evaluation of the patient with intracranial hemorrhage with chest heaviness.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to CT torso from the same day obtained earlier. There is prominence of the right paratracheal stripe consistent with known enlarged lymph node. Heart size and mediastinum are otherwise unchanged in the short interim. Calcified granuloma in the right lower lobe is redemonstrated. No new abnormalities within the lungs seen.
